discussion_comments.comment_body:
> which uses Oxc for JSX/TSX transformation instead of esbuild.

This isn't correct. These two plugins use transformers as shown in the table below. The difference is what handles the react-refresh transformation.

- plugin-react (without plugins)
  - dev (rollup-vite): uses babel for react-refresh transform + uses esbuild for JSX/TSX transform
  - dev (rolldown-vite): uses babel for react-refresh transform + uses Oxc for JSX/TSX transform
  - build (rollup-vite): uses esbuild for JSX/TSX transform
  - build (rolldown-vite): uses Oxc for JSX/TSX transform
- plugin-react-swc (without plugins)
  - dev (rollup-vite): uses SWC for react-refresh and JSX/TSX transform
  - dev (rolldown-vite): uses SWC for react-refresh and JSX/TSX transform
  - build (rollup-vite): uses esbuild for JSX/TSX transform
  - build (rolldown-vite): uses Oxc for JSX/TSX transform
- plugin-react-oxc
  - dev (rolldown-vite): uses Oxc for react-refresh and JSX/TSX transform
  - build (rolldown-vite): uses Oxc for JSX/TSX transform
